_sText:
Hello!

This map was inspired and remade in the image of Halfpipe.

This version is more difficult, but keep working cause once you get it you will love it.

The flashing lights make it all the rave, but the atmosphere lights are enough to see.

And dont forget the two round surfing areas, cause in the middle there are the only two shotguns. But be careful, fall and you die!

Have Fun!
